title: The State of NLP Literature: A Diachronic Analysis of the ACL Anthology

questions.question: Which 3 NLP areas are cited the most?
questions.free_form_answer: machine translation, statistical machine, sentiment analysis
evidence: FLOAT SELECTED: Figure 33 The most cited areas of research along with citation statistics split by gender of the first authors of corresponding papers.
highlighted_evidence: FLOAT SELECTED: Figure 33 The most cited areas of research along with citation statistics split by gender of the first authors of corresponding papers.

questions.question: Which journal and conference are cited the most in recent years?
evidence: FLOAT SELECTED: Figure 25 Average citations for papers published 1965–2016 (left side) and 2010–2016 (right side), grouped by venue and paper type.
highlighted_evidence: FLOAT SELECTED: Figure 25 Average citations for papers published 1965–2016 (left side) and 2010–2016 (right side), grouped by venue and paper type.

questions.question: Which 5 languages appear most frequently in AA paper titles?
questions.free_form_answer: English, Chinese, French, Japanese and Arabic
evidence: FLOAT SELECTED: Figure 11 A treemap of the 122 languages arranged alphabetically and shaded such that languages that appear more often in AA paper titles have a darker shade of green.
highlighted_evidence: FLOAT SELECTED: Figure 11 A treemap of the 122 languages arranged alphabetically and shaded such that languages that appear more often in AA paper titles have a darker shade of green.
